Body:
BC-SPOT-BUDGET-BOS 
  
 For Release FRIDAY AMs, June 12, 1998

   The Boston Globe plans to move the following stories for use by
NYTimes News Service clients.

        For questions about stories, contact    Al Simons    at the Boston
Globe,    617-929-2597.    For individual purchase of graphics or
photos please call 212 556-4204 or -1927.

   All stories will bear the BOS designator.

     WASHINGTON (w)  

   HOUSE-DISCHARGE (Washington) _ House Democrats seek to
circumvent Rules Committee by circulating discharge petitions to
get floor action. By Chris Black.

     NATIONAL (a)  

   JASPER-SLAYING (Jasper, Texas) _ Texas town tries to cope with
vicious racial slaying. By Bob Hohler.

     FINANCIAL (f)  

   MITSUBISHI-SETTLE (Undated) _ Automaker agrees to settle EEOC
sex harassment complaint for a record $34 million. By Steven
Wilmsen.

     The Boston Globe
